modName: Rikimaru and Ayame from Tenchu series (Ninja-Kunoichi-Assassin-Thief-Rogue)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#00ff00]For all 3D models and textures from Tenchu 3 and Shinobido characters look at the video below ! I'm looking for modders who want to make ninjas alive in Skyrim ! My Creation Kit never worked even once after weeks of trying so I'm unable to make 100% perfect characters because my armatures are always broken. Feel free to use it ![/color]

Hello Tenchu fans !
This mod was based on "The Ninja Project" by Infernozard7 on Nexus Skyrim. I remodeled, retextured everything and added few items.[/size]
[color=#ffff00]
[size=4]INSTALL RIKIMARU: [/size][/color]

1. Put "Meshes", "Textures" and "esp." in the /Data folder inside Skyrim directory.
2. Enable mod in the "Data files" after executing "SkyrimLauncher.exe"
3. Load your saved game
4. Open console command by pressing "~"
5. In the console command type: "help Rikimaru 0". Now you can see the list of all the items the mod uses with it's ID.
6. Type: "player.additem <ID of item here 1> (example: player.additem 03000BD6 1) 9. Close console "~". Open the inventory and put on the items. (I'm preety sure that head doesn't work for Khajit)
7. Download and Install "KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies and Stealthic" on Nexus Skyrim.
8. Type: "showracemenu" - it should turn on character creation. Adjust weight, mouth, nose and chin parameters to minimal if the face is glitching with the "Rikimaru's Head".
It was important to do it like this because of dissapearing hair,ears etc. Just try to make it similar to presented pictures.
Now go to hair section in the race menu and search for the one in the pictures. Best hair for Rikimaru is called "blue.nif" in the "meshes" folder.
If your Skyrim is overloaded and crashing because of 1000+ hair models just delete every nif. file except "blue.nif" and other ones you like. You can preview nif. files using NifScope.
9. Play

I used Imperial Male for showcasing this mod but it should work for Nords, Bretons and Redguards too.
I'm using "Weapons Of The Shogunate 1_06" by "Moraelin" for various types of japanese weapons.
For grapling hook install "Pull Mastery Hookshot or Grappling hook" by [b]"Xzax" on Skyrim Nexus.[/b]

[color=#ffff00][size=4]
INSTALL AYAME:[/size][/color]

I'm not the author of Ayame Mod. If you read this it means I'm still pending for permission. The author is called "Unrealrogue" on Nexus Skyrim and he also made this mod for Oblivion.
The permission for sharing files has "Nie" on "killingdool.com". This mod has a glitch with the chest area when you do any movement. It's still playable and not really disturbing.

Download link - http://killingdoll.com/?p=12917

I highly reccomend to download "Ponytail Hairstyles v3_0" by "Azar" on Nexus Skyrim. Hair in this pack are the ones shown in the pictures.


[youtube]EdlBzPDJauY[/youtube]

[youtube]Nqth4o2yRuA[/youtube]
If someone wants to make Tenchu and Shinobido related mods you can use 3d models here. Took me over 45 hours to make...

[youtube]I-6Sv33TQLs[/youtube]
author: Bleeiz
